item.title: Fulfilling Smart Lighting's Natural Purpose
item.description: I was originally going to title this post “Optimizing the Circadian Lighting Home Assistant Integration for use with Phillips Hue.” Thats the core of what the below is all about, but I eventually reconsidered, thinking it sounded a bit too much like jargon soup. So, before getting too into the weeds, lets begin by talking generally about smart lighting in the home. In my ongoing journey to create an ever more integrated smart-home, I have opted to utilize the Phillips Hue platform for my lighting.
